text: Nagareyama-ōtakanomori Station (流山おおたかの森駅,ながれやまおおたかのもりえき) is a Railway station of Tōbu Railway and Metropolitan Intercity Railway Company in Nagareyama, Chiba Prefecture, Japan. ==Adjacent stations== ; Tōbu Railway : Tōbu Noda Line ::: Hatsuishi - Nagareyama-ōtakanomori - Toyoshiki ; Metropolitan Intercity Railway Company : Tsukuba Express :: Rapid ::: Minami-Nagareyama (10) - Nagareyama-ōtakanomori (12) - Moriya (15) :: Seni-Rapid ::: Minami-Nagareyama (10) - Nagareyama-ōtakanomori (12) - Kashiwanoha-campus (13) :: Local ::: Nagareyama-centralpark (11) - Nagareyama-ōtakanomori (12) - Kashiwanoha-campus (13) Category:Railway stations in Chiba Prefecture
title: Nagareyama-ōtakanomori Station
